data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Jean was excited about the first day of school. He ____ packed ____ backpack ____ night ____, ____ he ____ his ____ to ____ a ____. He ____ happy ____ go ____, ____ wore ____ favorite ____. He was ready to learn!
data.partBlankContent: Jean was excited about the first day of school. He h__ packed h__ backpack t__ night bef___, a__ he as___ his m__ to pa__ a lu___. He w__ happy t_ go ba__, a__ wore h__ favorite clo____. He was ready to learn!
data.fullContent: Jean was excited about the first day of school. He had packed his backpack the night before, and he asked his mom to pack a lunch. He was happy to go back, and wore his favorite clothes. He was ready to learn!
data.answer: 开学的第一天，Jean很兴奋。他前一天晚上就打包好了背包，还让妈妈打包了午餐。他很高兴又回去了，穿上他最喜欢的衣服。他已经准备好去学习了!
